main event: A silver object, 10-12 feet long, was sighted in the sky over Richmond, California for 6-7 minutes.
interesting points: The object had no reported speed, sound, or maneuvers.
The object changed color from silver to blue-white to orange and back to blue-white.
The object appeared to be surrounded by a glow during the sightings.
The brightness of the orange light was comparable to a glowing cigarette ash.
The object made startling maneuvers when it turned bright orange.
witnesses: Fletcher Greenhouse, Orbal Beck, Dave Goldi0
